p: Generally, it is considered that milk production has a considerable environmental impact compared with milk substitutes [ 44]. However, among plant-based milks, almond milk has a considerable impact due to its irrigation needs and zinc fertilizer use and transportation to retail store [ 45]. When producing cheese alternatives, producers should be aware of the environmental costs of palm oil, as most of palm oil is not produced according to the Roundtable on Sustainable Palm Oil certification standard [ 50].
